bill_title: require the notarization of campaign and candidate finance forms.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the notarization of campaign and candidate finance forms. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 12-25-14 be amended to read as follows: 12-25-14. Any statement required by this chapter shall be on forms and verified in the manner prescribed by the secretary of state and shall be subscribed and sworn by the candidate or committee treasurer before a notary public . 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
